item.description:
Hello everyone!! Our April Meetup will be held on Sunday, April 26th from 11am to 1pm.

We are going to have an agility day!!!! Our member Paul, has offered to bring along some equipment he has and we can have some fun letting the puggies play and learn how to run a course. Award certificates will be given to the best performing puggies.

As always, we require proof of vaccinations for the rabies, distemper and canine cough. New guests please check in at the front desk.

All retail in the store will be 20% off for meet up members.

If you'd like to schedule a bath after the meetup, please give us call and we'll be happy to schedule an appointment for you.

Looking forward to seeing everyone!! Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Agni Sarmaniote
Center Manager
Best Friends Pet Care
Wakefield, MA
item.name: APRIL PUG DOG MEETUP
